subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers, who have been outscored in the first period, 7-1, in the last three games of the series, could not finish the job after overcoming another slow start in Game 6.
snippet: The Rangers, who have been outscored in the first period, 7-1, in the last three games of the series, could not finish the job after overcoming another slow start in Game 6.
